kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.arg: msg=O Elemento '${element}' não encontrado na tela
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
